messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

Certainly! Here's a list of the names of the people in the order you requested, separated by commas:

Amir, Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, Reza

This list is based on the scenario you described, where you can only pick one path to collect books. The list includes the names of the people who are donating books, in descending order based on the number of books they are donating.

Let me know if you have any other questions!
From Amir what is the shortest path to Jing? Starting from Amir, please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Certainly! Here's a list of the names of the people in the order you requested, separated by commas:

Amir, Wim, Jing, Wei, Raj, Nisha, Reza

This list is based on the scenario you described, where you can only pick one path to collect books and you're looking for the shortest path from Amir to Jing. The list includes the names of the people who are donating books, in ascending order based on the number of steps required to reach Jing from Amir.

Let me know if you have any other questions!

2stepPath.parsed_response:

The list includes the names of the people who are donating books, in ascending order based on the number of steps required to reach Jing from Amir.
